Posts.Content: When insurance companies and our benevolent government will not use these records against us, I will consider. Since tissue samples from every one of my surgeries have been sold to research universities, with no consent required, I'm already in data bases which can be used against not only me, but any offspring genetically for five generations. So what to do? Protect your information? Can't be done. So do genetic testing to further research, because your on a insurance company red list already.
Posts.Title: Gene testing, precision medicine, and shared information
